description: A wrapper object for all the series options in specific states.

children.name: inactive
children.description: The opposite state of a hover for series.

children.name: normal
children.description: The normal state of a series, or for point items in column, pie and similar series. Currently only used for setting animation when returning to normal state from hover.

children.name: select
children.description: Specific options for point in selected states, after being selected by allowPointSelect or programmatically.
